text: aur kapataachaaree purushon aur kapataachaaree striyon aur bahudevavaadee purushon aur bahudevavaadee striyon ko, jo allaah ke baare mein bura gumaan rakhate hai, yaatana de. unheen par buraee kee gardish hai. unapar allaah ka krodh hua aur usane unapar laanat kee, aur usane unake lie jahannam taiyaar kar rakha hai, aur vah atyant bura thikaana hai
